sn34.46-49:0.3: 46–49. Four on Subjects and Projection, Etc.
sn34.46-49:1.2: “One meditator is skilled in the mindfulness meditation subjects for immersion but not in projecting the mind purified by immersion. …”
sn34.46-49:2.1: (These four discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
